API Reference¶

async get_skin(user: str)¶

Get a player’s raw skin image can be used in both render_3d_head() and render_3d_skin()

Parameters

user (str) – Username or UUID

Returns

Raw skin image

Return type

PIL.Image.Image

Raises

ValueError – Username or UUID is invalid

async render_3d_head(user: str = '', vr: int = - 25, hr: int = 35, ratio: int = 12, display_hair: bool = True, aa: bool = False, skin_image: Optional[PIL.Image.Image] = None)¶

Render a player’s head

Parameters

  • user (str) – Username or UUID of the player

  • vr (int) – Vertical rotation of the output image

  • hr (int) – Horizontal rotation of the output image

  • ratio (int) – Resolution of the returned image

  • display_hair (bool) – Whether or not the second head layer should be displayed

  • display_second_layer (bool) – Whether or not the second skin layer should be displayed

  • aa (bool) – Antializing: smoothens the corners a bit

  • skin_image (PIL.Image.Image) – minecraft skin image to prevent api calls

Returns

The rendered head

Return type

PIL.Image.Image

Raises

ValueError – Given username and/or uuid is invalid

async render_3d_skin(user: str = '', vr: int = - 25, hr: int = 35, hrh: int = 0, vrll: int = 0, vrrl: int = 0, vrla: int = 0, vrra: int = 0, ratio: int = 12, display_hair: bool = True, display_second_layer: bool = True, aa: bool = False, skin_image: Optional[PIL.Image.Image] = None)¶

Render a full body skin

Parameters

  • user (str) – Username or UUID of the player

  • vr (int) – Vertical rotation of the output image

  • hr (int) – Horizontal rotation of the output image

  • hrh (int) – Horizontal head rotation

  • vrll (int) – Vertical rotation of the left leg

  • vrrl (int) – Vertical rotation of the right leg

  • vrla (int) – Vertical rotation of the left arm

  • vrra (int) – Vertical rotation of the right arm

  • ratio (int) – Resolution of the returned image

  • display_hair (bool) – Whether or not the second head layer should be displayed

  • display_second_layer (bool) – Whether or not the second skin layer should be displayed

  • aa (bool) – Antializing: smoothens the corners a bit

  • skin_image (PIL.Image.Image) – minecraft skin image to prevent api calls

Returns

The rendered skin

Return type

PIL.Image.Image

Raises

ValueError – Given username and/or uuid is invalid

async to_name(uuid: str, timestamp: Optional[float] = None)¶

Converts a UUID to a username by querying the mojang api

Parameters

  • uuid (int) – uuid you would like to convert

  • timestamp (float) – By passing this you can get old usernames

Returns

username – The username of the player

Return type

str

Raises

ValueError – Entered uuid is invalid

async to_uuid(name: str)¶

Converts a username to a UUID by querying the mojang api

Parameters

name (str) – Username you would like to convert

Returns

UUID – The UUID of the player

Return type

str

Raises

ValueError – Entered name is invalid
